LetcodeInputPage.description: This page provides various input fields to practice different input-related scenarios and learn about sendKeys(), Keyboard TAB, getAttribute(), clear(), and isEnabled() methods.

elements.name: Enter your full Name Input
elements.description: Input field to enter the full name.

elements.name: Append a text and press keyboard tab Input
elements.primary_locator: role=textbox[name="Append a text and press keyboard tab"]
elements.backup_locator: css=input[placeholder='Append a text and press keyboard tab']
elements.description: Input field to append text and press tab.

elements.name: What is inside the text box Input
elements.primary_locator: role=textbox[name="What is inside the text box"]
elements.backup_locator: css=input[placeholder='What is inside the text box']
elements.description: Input field to check what is inside the text box.

elements.name: Clear the text Input
elements.description: Input field to clear the text.

elements.name: Confirm edit field is disabled Input
